```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(calendR)
```

::: callout-important
## Read carefully!

It is a student's responsibility to periodically check this website to make sure he/she has the most updated information about the course schedule.
:::

```{r calendar1, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Vector of dates
dates <- seq(as.Date("2023-03-01"), as.Date("2023-03-31"), by = "1 day")

# Vector of NA and weekends
# (with the week starting on Monday)
events <- ifelse(format(dates, "%w") %in% c(6, 0), "Weekend", NA)

events[c(13, 15, 20, 22, 27, 29)] <- "Classes"

calendR(year = 2023, 
        month = 3, 
        start = "M",
        title = "Class calendar",
        subtitle = "March 2023",
        special.days = events,
        special.col = c("#00AAAE", "gray"),
        low.col = "white",
        legend.pos = "bottom", # Legend position
        legend.title = "",
        text = c("11:00-13:00",
                 "16:00-18:00", 
                 "11:00-13:00",
                 "16:00-18:00",
                 "11:00-13:00",
                 "16:00-18:00"),             
        text.pos = c(13, 15, 20, 22, 27, 29),        
        text.size = 2.5,              
        text.col = "black")
```

```{r calendar_2, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# Vector of dates
dates <- seq(as.Date("2023-04-01"), as.Date("2023-04-30"), by = "1 day")

# Vector of NA and weekends
# (with the week starting on Monday)
events <- ifelse(format(dates, "%w") %in% c(6, 0), "Weekend", NA)

events[c(3, 5, 10, 12, 17, 26, 28)] <- "Classes"
events[19] <- "1st Mid-term exam"

calendR(year = 2023, 
        month = 04, 
        start = "M",
        title = "Class calendar",
        subtitle = "April 2023",
        special.days = events,
        special.col = c("gold", "#00AAAE", "gray"),
        low.col = "white",
        legend.pos = "bottom", # Legend position
        legend.title = "",
        text = c("16:00-18:00",
                 "11:00-13:00"),             
        text.pos = c(3, 5, 10, 12, 17, 19, 26, 28),        
        text.size = 2.5,              
        text.col = "black")
```
